quote: A palindrome,” I said the first time she told me. She looked at me, perplexed, and that’s when I knew I could never love her. What a waste of a palindrome she was, that Hannah.-Owen Gentry
quote_letters: A PALINDROME I SAID THE FIRST TIME SHE TOLD ME SHE LOOKED AT ME PERPLEXED AND THATS WHEN I KNEW I COULD NEVER LOVE HER WHAT A WASTE OF A PALINDROME SHE WAS THAT HANNAH-OWEN GENTRY
